    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Appointment
    The Appointment class represents an appointment in the appointment scheduling system.
    doctorAppointmentManagement
    The doctorAppointmentManagement interface defines methods for managing doctor actions on patient appointments, specifically for accepting or declining appointments.
    DoctorAppointmentManager
    The DoctorAppointmentManager class manages appointment actions for doctors, such as accepting or declining appointments.
    DoctorAvailability
    The DoctorAvailability class allows doctors to set their availability on a given date.
    DoctorInformationAccess
    The DoctorInformationAccess class provides doctors with access to view and update the medical records of patients assigned to them.
    DoctorScheduleView
    The DoctorScheduleView class provides functionalities for doctors to view their schedules, including both all appointments and upcoming confirmed appointments.
    doctorViewAppointment
    The doctorViewAppointment interface defines methods for viewing a doctor's appointment schedule.
    patientAppointmentManagement
    The patientAppointmentManagement interface defines methods for managing patient appointments, including scheduling, canceling, and rescheduling appointments.
    PatientAppointmentManager
    The PatientAppointmentManager class implements the patientAppointmentManagement interface to handle scheduling, canceling, and rescheduling appointments for patients.
    PatientAppointmentView
    The PatientAppointmentView class provides functionalities for patients to view available appointment slots and check the status of their scheduled appointments.
    patientViewAppointment
    The patientViewAppointment interface defines methods for viewing appointment-related information for patients.
